string.text: Base, requesting a squad at %s, do you copy?
Come in base, we need a squad at %s, copy?
Come in base, requesting a squad at %s, over.
Base, do you copy? I need a squad at %s, over.
Base, we need a squad at %s asap, over.
Copy that, we're sending a squad from %s to your location.
We hear you, sending a squad from %s to your location now.
Roger, we're sending a squad your way from %s now.
Affirmative, squad is being deployed to your location from %s.
Roger that, a squad from %s is now moving out to your location.
Sit tight, we're already headed to %s.
Hey, we're already on the way to %s, over.
Base already sent us to your location at %s.
We're heading to %s already, don't worry.
Heads up, we're already headed to %s.
Negative, there are no bases in your vicinity to reinforce, over.
No can do, there are no bases in range of your area.
Negative, there are no bases in range of your area, over.
Not possible, we have no bases in range of your area.
Not possible, we have no bases in your vicinity to reinforce.
An allied attack force from %s is launching an assault on %s.
Enemy forces are approaching %s.
Base, enemy forces targeting %s have been eliminated, over.
Great job, boys - we wiped them out! Everybody at %s can rest now.
Good job, guys. Looks like there aren't any more hostiles headed to %s.
Looks like we're clear - %s is secure.
Come in base, we repelled the forces attacking %s, over.
Enemy forces are approaching %s. Reinforcements have been sent.
Enemy forces are approaching %s. More reinforcements are needed!
Enemy forces are approaching %s. Reinforcements needed!
